text: St. Paul's College, Ranchi, is a general degree college in Ranchi, Jharkhand. It was established in 1967 by the Diocese of Chotanagpur and the Church of North India. It provides undergraduate education in liberal arts, commerce and sciences. It is affiliated to Ranchi University. ==See also== *Education in India *Ranchi University *Literacy in India *List of institutions of higher education in Jharkhand ==References== ==External links== * http://www.stpaulscollege.co.in/ * Category:Colleges affiliated to Ranchi University Category:Educational institutions established in 1980 Category:Universities and colleges in Ranchi Category:Universities and colleges in Jharkhand
title: St. Paul's College, Ranchi
